article: We are in the park now.  _  is a big and beautiful park.  There are  many people in it. We all like this park. The park has a  _  , too. We can boat on it. But we  _  swim in it. It is dangerous . Look at that family. They are under the tree. The boy is  _  the left of his father. The family bring their  _  to the park. It is a white cat. The boy has a  _  in his hand. He wants to fly it. But I think they  _  look for a right place . It's not a good place here. There are too many trees. The mother has a beautiful handbag. It's  _  . I like the colour. It's the colour of the sky . There is a sign in the tree. It says "  _  climb the tree!"But the cat is in the tree now.
